resources.string: The original Grow\'s epic cards game, now on Android!
This app was made with only studying purposes.\n Check out the about section for more info.

Hi!
 I'm Eduardo Scaranari, the developer of this app.

 As a huge fan of the Grow's Super Trunfo Battle Cards and also an Android student, I just decided to code it for practice.

 Hope you enjoy it and, if you do, don't hesitate on contacting me using one of the channels below.
